sentences.en: Aeon aeon thou existed in beauty.
Human nature in this aeon is in view.
sentences.cn: 这里所指的,是这个世代的人性.

sentences.en: Most Autobots abandon Cybertron for either Earth or bases on Aeon and Secundus.
sentences.cn: 多数汽车人离开塞伯坦,前往地球,或往万年星与铁甲星.

sentences.en: Note: You are required to complete the autopay instruction at AEON branch upon card collection.
sentences.cn: 注: 自动转账手续需于取卡时于AEON分行办理.

trans.tran_cn: <正>极漫长的时期，千万年，<地>极长时期，十亿年期
trans.tran_en: an extremely long period of time
